resources.string: This software is a group control software designed for the design of Everest series robots. It can control the execution and dance of several robots under the same WIFI at the same time. Main function description:
1、Action selection: you can select the dance action for the robot to execute in the list.
2、Action execution/Stop action: the control robot starts executing the selected dance movements or allows the robot to stop the current action.

3、File download: will need to download the resource files on control equipment under the root directory GroupControl file, click on the "download" file directory will be displayed, click on the corresponding file will download the file group to each group control of robots, downloading large files will take longer, download music files and the file name to the same, the robot end play action files and music match the file name must be the same to make movements and music.

4、Music set the delay time: refers to the control equipment end play music delay time relative to the robot to perform an action, can most instructions ahead of time delay time length can be delayed for 10 seconds, the default value is 0 seconds.

5、Group control: can score a total of 255 group, group before the need to manually input grouping in the robot, and then in the new grouping, can batch is created, click a group can be modified to this, have to click on the modify button in order to be successful after modification, after each operation need to be preserved. The delay time is the number of milliseconds, and the grouping control command shares the same latency time with the previous control commands.
This test software function has been fully introduced, welcome to use.
The instruction execution takes time, please wait a moment.
Set the instruction to execute the delay time:
No resource file was found under the directory GroupControl.
Click the list below to select the data rows to be changed.
Please confirm that you want to modify the data?
Do you want to save this operation?
Are you sure you want to delete this strip?
Packet start ID and packet over ID were not empty.
End of packet ID is not less than group initiation ID.
The delay time is not empty.
Please pay attention to operation, duplicate address is not input.
Do you close the robot sound?
Please turn off the battery delection first
